For more information about library instruction options and our Teaching & Learning staff, please visit the Teaching & Learning LibGuide.

We look forward to providing your students with an engaging instruction session. Please note that we are unable to guarantee physical classroom sessions at this time. While we will do our best to honor your request, please know that we have a number of synchronous and asynchronous options that promise to deliver the same content virtually. Thank you for your understanding and patience.

This form should be used if you need to request a library instructor for a class. Please click here if you need to reserve a room and do not need to request an instructor.

If you would like to schedule a class about Special Collections materials, please use the Special Collections Instruction Request Form.

Please allow two weeks for us to prepare the best session possible for you. If you have any questions, please e-mail libraryinstruction@virginia.edu.
